actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide that Federal rights-of-way may be issued for coal pipelines utilizing groundwater only where affected States have approved such utilization, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Prohibits granting a right-of-way under the Federal Land Policy and Management Act of 1976 for a coal pipeline using groundwater in connection with such transportation unless each affected State has consented to such use.

titles.title: A bill to provide that Federal rights-of-way may be issued for coal pipelines utilizing groundwater only where affected States have approved such utilization, and for other purposes.
